title: User Stories Diagram - ITgroup25
description: 用户故事图表，包含各个Epic下的用户故事详情

user_stories.i_want: Submission only go through when all fields are filled in and at least one tick box is selected for each question
user_stories.so_that: It only goes through if I have provided all the required information and left no fields empty

user_stories.i_want: To be able to submit all the information the form wants me to
user_stories.so_that: I can formally submit my query to RIC staff

user_stories.i_want: To be able to choose between a Simple or Complex referral
user_stories.so_that: I can advise the RIC staff on the complexity of my question

user_stories.i_want: Additional fields to be displayed when either Complex or Simple referral is chosen
user_stories.so_that: Additional information specific to the query type can be collected

user_stories.i_want: Different pop-ups will appear for Simple Query and Complex Referral
user_stories.so_that: So that the form guides me with relevant fields/questions

user_stories.i_want: Submitted queries to generate an email for both requestor and administrator
user_stories.so_that: I as the requestor receive confirmation of submission to know that the submission was successful, and I as the administrator receive the submission to answer back

user_stories.i_want: Each query to have a unique ID
user_stories.so_that: I can quickly track and manage follow-ups

user_stories.i_want: That after a simple query submission, a pop-up will appear containing a chatbot with pre-prepared responses and links
user_stories.so_that: It can resolve commonly asked questions such as process walkthroughs, explanations, and helpful resources without requiring the resources of RIC staff

user_stories.i_want: That after a simple query submission, there will be a service feedback section
user_stories.so_that: Requestor can notice admin the request need further replies

user_stories.i_want: Complex referrals to require uploaded documents
user_stories.so_that: Administrators can better understand and analyze complex referral issues

user_stories.i_want: Submitted requests, documents, and follow-ups to be stored in the system database
user_stories.so_that: Requests can be viewed and categorized for better background awareness

user_stories.i_want: The system to support data export to Excel/Google Sheets
user_stories.so_that: I, as an administrator without technical background can access data easily

user_stories.i_want: The reporting sheet to be filterable by date range
user_stories.so_that: I, as an administrator can select questions by time period

user_stories.i_want: The reporting sheet to allow filtering by query type
user_stories.so_that: I, as an administrator can analyze specific groups of questions

user_stories.i_want: To be able to edit the options and fields of the form
user_stories.so_that: There is no need to rebuild the entire form when new options are required
